# Static Route Multi-Gateway Configuration Test Fixture (REQ-3)
# Tests parsing of same prefix with multiple gateways
# Also tests weight and filter attributes

# Default route with primary gateway
ip route default gateway 192.168.1.1

# Same prefix with multiple gateways for ECMP/failover
ip route 10.33.128.0/21 gateway 192.168.1.20
ip route 10.33.128.0/21 gateway 192.168.1.21 weight 10
ip route 10.33.128.0/21 gateway 192.168.1.22 weight 20

# Route with filter attribute
ip route 172.16.0.0/12 gateway 192.168.1.1 filter 1
ip route 172.16.0.0/12 gateway 192.168.1.2 filter 2

# Route to PP interface
ip route 10.10.0.0/16 gateway pp 1
ip route 10.10.0.0/16 gateway pp 2 weight 5

# Route to tunnel interface
ip route 192.168.100.0/24 gateway tunnel 1
ip route 192.168.100.0/24 gateway tunnel 2 weight 10

# Route with keepalive option
ip route 10.20.0.0/16 gateway 192.168.1.50 keepalive

# Route with both weight and filter
ip route 10.30.0.0/16 gateway 192.168.1.60 weight 5 filter 100
ip route 10.30.0.0/16 gateway 192.168.1.61 weight 10 filter 101

# Default route with DHCP-derived gateway
ip route default gateway dhcp lan2

# Route to null interface (blackhole)
ip route 192.0.2.0/24 gateway null

# Route with dotted mask notation (legacy format)
ip route 10.0.0.0/255.0.0.0 gateway 192.168.1.100

# Multiple gateways with mixed interface types
ip route 10.40.0.0/16 gateway 192.168.1.70
ip route 10.40.0.0/16 gateway pp 3 weight 100
ip route 10.40.0.0/16 gateway tunnel 5 weight 200
